lead_paragraph: To celebrate their 50th NHL season, the Los Angeles Kings honored the goal scorers from the "Miracle on Manchester" playoff comeback prior to their game Saturday.
snippet: To celebrate their 50th NHL season, the Los Angeles Kings honored the goal scorers from the "Miracle on Manchester" playoff comeback prior to their game Saturday....

headline.main: Kings Hold On for 3-2 Win Over Sharks Behind Carter's Goal
headline.print_headline: Kings Hold On for 3-2 Win Over Sharks Behind Carter's Goal
